description: Hi, this application does not work on the newest, up to date kde neon. I'm really sorry but I have to give it 1 star. Once it would be working ill change my review.
Won't start on my machine, and up to date KDE Neon.

Well thought out digital travel assistant that works perfectly on the pinephone pro!

Maybe a feature to synchronize via kde connect would be a nice to have, but all in all everything I need.
